title: Ping on NA for players from EUW
body:
Hello guys, 
I would ask u how can i fix my ping on NA server, when i am from EUW. I created account on NA, so I tried it. I had over 170 ms i really cant play. Can i stabilaze it, when i am from EUW?

replies.body: Appreciate for your help, it works fine :) . I tried it on my smurf and ping was 36-40 ms.
what did you do to fix your ping?

You do have a very long and overseas distance reaching the NA region, so you would certainly experience some higher ping.  You can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help tune up your connection, but keep in mind it can't really exceed that physical distance.  Hope it helps!
